mapper.sql: guid, id, total, page, code, name, ssize, units, life, salvage, rate, year, month, create_time
mapper.select: select * from fixed_net_asset order by id desc
select * from fixed_net_asset order by id desc limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into fixed_net_asset (guid, id, total, page, code, name, ssize, units, life, salvage, rate, year, month, create_time) values (#{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{page,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ssize,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{units,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{life,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{salvage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{year,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{month,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update fixed_net_asset
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total = #{total,jdbcType=CHAR},
page = #{page,jdbcType=CHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
ssize = #{ssize,jdbcType=CHAR},
units = #{units,jdbcType=CHAR},
life = #{life,jdbcType=BIGINT},
salvage = #{salvage,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
year = #{year,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
month = #{month,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}

update fixed_net_asset set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=CHAR}, page = #{page,jdbcType=CHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, ssize = #{ssize,jdbcType=CHAR}, units = #{units,jdbcType=CHAR}, life = #{life,jdbcType=BIGINT}, salvage = #{salvage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, year = #{year,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, month = #{month,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where guid = #{guid,jdbcType=CHAR}
